message.entry: NumTxAntennas must be chosen between 1 and 8.
NumRxAntennas must be chosen between 1 and 8.
InputSamplePeriod must be greater than zero.
DopplerSpectrum must be a single doppler object or a vector of doppler objects of the same length as PathDelays.
Unsupported Doppler spectrum type.
AvgPathGaindB must be real-valued and the same size as PathDelays.
NormalizePathGains must be scalar boolean.
TxCorrelationMatrix must be equal to 1 if NumTxAntennas is 1.
TxCorrelationMatrix is not of size NumTxAntennas x NumTxAntennas.
TxCorrelationMatrix must have hermitian symmetry.
The diagonal elements of TxCorrelationMatrix must be all ones.
The elements of TxCorrelationMatrix must have an absolute value smaller or equal to 1.
TxCorrelationMatrix is not of size NumTxAntennas x NumTxAntennas x L, L being the length of PathDelays.
TxCorrelationMatrix must have hermitian symmetry.
The diagonal elements of TxCorrelationMatrix must be all ones.
The elements of TxCorrelationMatrix must have an absolute value smaller or equal to 1.
TxCorrelationMatrix must be either a matrix or a three-dimensional array.
RxCorrelationMatrix must be equal to 1 if NumRxAntennas is 1.
RxCorrelationMatrix is not of size NumRxAntennas x NumRxAntennas.
RxCorrelationMatrix must have hermitian symmetry.
The diagonal elements of RxCorrelationMatrix must be all ones.
The elements of RxCorrelationMatrix must have an absolute value smaller or equal to 1.
RxCorrelationMatrix is not of size NumRxAntennas x NumRxAntennas x L, L being the length of PathDelays.
RxCorrelationMatrix must have hermitian symmetry.
The diagonal elements of RxCorrelationMatrix must be all ones.
The elements of RxCorrelationMatrix must have an absolute value smaller or equal to 1.
RxCorrelationMatrix must be either a matrix or a three-dimensional array.
KFactor must be a scalar or a row vector of the same size as PathDelays.
DirectPathDopplerShift must be of the same size as KFactor.
When the maximum Doppler shift is zero, setting DirectPathDopplerShift to a non-zero value has no effect on the channel. DirectPathDopplerShift should also be set to zero.
DirectPathInitPhase must be of the same size as KFactor.
When the maximum Doppler shift is zero, setting DirectPathInitPhase to a non-zero value has no effect on the channel. DirectPathInitPhase should also be set to zero.
StorePathGains must be scalar boolean.
ResetBeforeFiltering must be scalar boolean.
